ATTITUDE Oceanly Phyto-Glow Night Cream

Brand: ATTITUDE

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, jojoba esters, glycerin, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, dicaprylyl ether, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, oleyl lactate, undecane, caprylic/capric triglycerides, aqua/water/eau, tridecane, behenyl behenate, zea mays (corn) starch,

seed oil, dicaprylyl ether, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, oleyl lactate, undecane, caprylic/capric triglycerides, aqua/water/eau, tridecane, behenyl behenate, zea mays (corn) starch, polyhydroxystearic acid, polyglyceryl-6 laurate, panthenol, polyglyceryl-10 oleate, sucrose laurate, sucrose stearate, acacia decurrens flower wax,

behenyl behenate, zea mays (corn) starch, polyhydroxystearic acid, polyglyceryl-6 laurate, panthenol, polyglyceryl-10 oleate, sucrose laurate, sucrose stearate, acacia decurrens flower wax, polyglycerin-3, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, sorbitan palmitate, hydrolyzed soy protein, 3-o-ethyl ascorbic acid, palmaria palmata (dulse) extract,

stearate, acacia decurrens flower wax, polyglycerin-3, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, sorbitan palmitate, hydrolyzed soy protein, 3-o-ethyl ascorbic acid, palmaria palmata (dulse) extract, glycogen, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, magnolol, honokiol, rice amino acids, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate, hydrolyzed

ascorbic acid, palmaria palmata (dulse) extract, glycogen, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, magnolol, honokiol, rice amino acids, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate, hydrolyzed adansonia digitata (baobab) seed extract, proline

Directions: Push up tube. At night, apply evenly to a clean face and massage until completely absorbed. Use our face serum as a first step for best results.

Warnings: Store at a temperature below 90 F. Avoid contact of the packaging with water. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.
